title: Socially Grounded Project-Based Learning Design for Enhancing Ecological Literacy

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Conducting community-linked projects in a smartphone-centric technological environment.

learning_goals: Analyze community environmental issues and propose solutions based on ecological literacy
Develop and implement action plans for ecologically friendly behaviors in daily life

In project teams of 4–5, learners can select one local environmental issue and, over six months, establish a three-phase (research-planning-execution) campaign plan, deliver environmental conservation messages to over 100 residents through at least two on-site activities.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
